name: Fate of the Earth 3D Roller puzzle platformer
name_original: Fate of the Earth 3D Roller puzzle platformer
description: Fate of the earth places you in the role as God. Move the rolling earth around several levels to witness the fabric of humanity. Watch out for the blunders and obstacles of human society that will prevent you from moving forward. You Decide the outcome of the human race. This version is available in anaglyph 3D and normal.
